00002 // FredkinCell.h
00003 // ---------
00004 #include <stdio.h>
00005 #include "AbstractCell.h"
00006 
00007 #ifndef FredkinCell_h
00008 #define FredkinCell_h
00009 
00010 class FredkinCell : public AbstractCell {
00011 
00012     public:
00013         int age;
00014 
00015         FredkinCell (char c) : AbstractCell((c)) {
00016             // Age will be -1 for dead FredkinCell
00017             life = !(c == '-');
00018             if (life){
00019                 age = (c == '+') ? 10 : c - '0';
00020             } else {
00021                 age = -1;
00022             }
00023         }
00024 
00025         FredkinCell* clone () const {
00026             return new FredkinCell(*this);
00027         }
00028 
00029         char get() const {
00030             if (life) {
00031                 assert(age > -1);
00032                 if (age < 10) {
00033                     // age if age is less than 10
00034                     return age + '0';
00035                 } else {
00036                     // + if age is greater than 9
00037                     return '+';
00038                 }
00039             } else {
00040                 assert (age == -1);
00041                 // - if dead
00042                 return '-';
00043             }
00044         }
00045 
00046         void eval() {
00047             assert(neighbors >= 0 && neighbors <= 4);
00048             // a live cell becomes a dead cell, if 0, 2, or 4 neighbors are
00049             // alive
00050             if (life && (neighbors%2 == 0)) {
00051                 life = false;
00052                 age = -1;
00053             // a dead cell becomes a live cell, if 1 or 3 neighbors are alive
00054             } else if (!life && neighbors%2 == 1) {
00055                 life = true;
00056             }
00057 
00058             // Increment age
00059             if (life) {
00060                 ++age;
00061             }
00062         }
00063 
00064         void conwayInc() {}
00065 
00066         void incNeighbors() {
00067             ++neighbors;
00068         }
00069 
00070         void setNeighbors(int n) {
00071             neighbors = n;
00072         }
00073 };
00074 
00075 #endif // FredkinCell_h
